Documentation for |package|¶

|package| consists of a python mocule named |mainmod|, and a frontend program named |mainprog|. |mainmod| contains functions that can parse a text of certain formats (|formatsup| for now), analyze the text using user-definable rules. |mainmod| is modular, making it very easy to add your own rules in the form of handler functions.

  • check_document.py — improve bad documents
    • Writing your own configfile
  • scidoc — Text analyzer for scientific documents
